overview: Soviet Lithuania, 1987.  This drama is based on real events.  The girl Emilija does not know that she has two sisters and a mother.  Emilija is experiencing loneliness.  She runs away from school, sometimes longing for death.  She hovers around in a sandbox and imagines herself playing a funeral march.  One day, Emilija receives the news that her sisters and mother have appeared, but that doesn’t make her happy - she had fallen in love with strangers.
title: Nepalikit, prašau
